issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
I am facing multiple issues while installing app in Android 8.0.0 running device. 
# Issues are as follows: 
1. I am not able to install app directly from Appcelerator studio. It shows following error while attempt.

*[ERROR] :  Application failed to install
The current timeout is set to 240000 ms
You can increase this timeout by running: titanium.js config android.appInstallTimeout <timeout ms>*

I have installed apk file by placing it in device storage using Android File transfer.
2.user Permission Popup:  upon first app open, app doesn't wait for user's interaction for permission.
3. It shows permission is not allowed, while accessing calendar functions from the app
4. webview shows offline content in app. baseURL property is not working for Android webview and local images are not displaying in webview.
5. App shows error while resuming. screenshot attached.
fields.environment:
# Appcelerator Studio: 4.9.0.201705302345
# operating system: macOS Sierra: 10.12.5
# Android installed API and SDK tools: Android 8.0.0 (API 26)

comments.body: Building for Android O will be supported with this PR by [~gmathews]: https://github.com/appcelerator/node-titanium-sdk/pull/14, see TIMOB-24900 for details.
